zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[当前震荡整理，短期走势偏弱]
zh.content:
当前以太坊/美元(ETH/USD)价格处于1824.86附近，呈现出较为平稳的震荡走势。24小时内价格变动幅度较小，仅为0.21%，显示出市场情绪较为谨慎。由于当前价格接近SMA(20)均线1861.82，市场有一定的压力，短期内可能面临进一步的整理或小幅回调。

技术指标方面，MACD目前呈现负值(-22.22)，表明短期内卖压较重，但由于Signal线数据缺失，无法做出更准确的判断。RSI未提供数据，导致短期内无法准确评估超买或超卖情况。结合当前的市场走势，ETH/USD可能会继续在区间内波动，投资者需保持警惕。

支撑位方面，价格在1815.4附近存在较强的支撑，若突破该区域，可能会进一步下探至更低水平。阻力位则位于1829.91附近，若突破该区域，可能会尝试反弹至1860附近。在此区间内的震荡整理可能持续一段时间。

建议短期内保持观望，若价格突破支撑位或阻力位，可以考虑进场操作。对于风险承受能力较高的投资者，可以适当在支撑位附近尝试做多，但需谨慎设立止损位。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum is currently trading at 1824.86, hovering near the lower end of its intraday range between 1815.4 and 1829.91. The marginal 0.21% 24-hour gain reflects short-term indecision rather than clear directional strength. Price action remains subdued, with momentum constrained beneath the 20-day simple moving average at 1861.82. This positioning suggests the broader short-term trend is mildly bearish, as the market continues to print lower highs below dynamic resistance.

The negative MACD reading at -22.22 reinforces prevailing downside pressure, indicating that bearish momentum has not fully dissipated. Although the signal line is unavailable, the depth of the MACD below zero implies sustained weakness in medium-term momentum. With RSI data missing, overbought or oversold conditions cannot be confirmed; however, the current structure does not indicate strong bullish reversal characteristics. Consolidation near the daily low suggests sellers remain active on minor rallies.

Immediate support is developing around 1815, aligning with the session’s low. A decisive breakdown below this level could expose 1780 as the next psychological and structural support zone. On the upside, resistance is clearly defined near 1860–1865, coinciding with the 20-day SMA. A sustained close above this moving average would be required to shift short-term sentiment and potentially trigger short covering toward the 1900 region.

From a trading perspective, momentum currently favors cautious positioning. Short-term traders may consider selling rallies toward 1850–1860 with tight risk management above 1870. Conversely, bullish setups become more attractive only upon a confirmed breakout above the 20-day SMA, ideally supported by improving momentum indicators. Until volatility expands and direction clarifies, range-based strategies and disciplined stop placement remain essential in this environment.
